Text: Great movie in a very good dvd. Thanks for uploading and special thanks for the magic detail "dvd9 untouched", I hope that more people will upload without compressions of any kind. It is not your fault if Italian is not among so many texted languages. I can manage  with English audio and subs but is surprising to discover that my languageis so little important at least in dvd editors opinion. Thanks again.
